channel.title: F2P vs P2P Wild
channel.description:
Why don't you just allow players to toggle it themselves? As in each player gets their own setting for it, and when they go in the wild it only allows them to see, and interact with other players on the same setting.
It'd be really easy to implement, and it would stop all this retarded arguing over which is better, which should be on for longer, etc.

item.title: F2P vs P2P Wild
item.dc:creator: @SVU SVU
item.description:
@SVU wrote:

[quote=“CodeForFame, post:3, topic:388052”][quote author=Kryptix link=topic=483869.msg3544917#msg3544917 date=1301124505]
The same reason why people don’t open up a F2P world and a P2P world, it halves the player count basically meaning there’s half the amount of players in the wilderness. We’ve done several polls and half vote for F2P, half vote for P2P but some of those don’t mind either way, so if it’s F2P then they just get on with it but if they have a choice it pretty much goes 50/50.
[/quote]

Your argument is invalid. The near 50% that refuse to pk in the other just don’t go PKing… So, you’re effectively removing nearly 50% of the population by not having it that way, rather than letting all 100% be in the wild with their preference; which also makes them happy.[/quote]
Luke is a new fag who thinks he was a good pker back in the day. Let him be

Read full topic

item.description:
@Intoxication wrote:

Nah, you’re wrong

Great argument!

Read full topic

item.title: F2P vs P2P Wild
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

The same reason why people don’t open up a F2P world and a P2P world, it halves the player count basically meaning there’s half the amount of players in the wilderness. We’ve done several polls and half vote for F2P, half vote for P2P but some of those don’t mind either way, so if it’s F2P then they just get on with it but if they have a choice it pretty much goes 50/50.

Your argument is invalid. The near 50% that refuse to pk in the other just don’t go PKing… So, you’re effectively removing nearly 50% of the population by not having it that way, rather than letting all 100% be in the wild with their preference; which also makes them happy.

Read full topic

item.title: F2P vs P2P Wild
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

correct kryptix.

player count goes halved. though an instancing system really needs to be set up in rsc servers. not shoddy dungeons/raids and deathmatches that are not instanced and need to wait for the first batch of people to leave.

Read full topic
